about_the_game:
OverlayView (OV) is a multitasking tool designed for gamers and productivity enthusiasts, enabling you to overlay any browser or application directly on top of your game or other apps. Your selected application will stay on top of all other windows no matter what you do. With OV, you gain the power to seamlessly integrate multiple tasks into one screen, enhancing your gaming and multitasking experience like never before.

Transparency
The overlay’s transparency can be easily adjusted through simple shortcuts, ensuring that your focus remains uninterrupted. Additionally, the transparency feature allows you to make the overlay see-through, so you never miss any crucial in-game action.

Application Variability
One of OV’s standout features is its ability to instantiate a view inside the overlay, giving you full access to the internet without switching screens. This feature is perfect for consuming content, managing social media, or conducting quick searches while in the middle of a gaming session. Whether you’re following a tutorial, watching a video, or browsing the web, OV allows you to do it all without ever leaving your game. You can also launch Notepad, Calculator, Spotify, or whatever you want on OV.

Interactability
OverlayView offers the ability to toggle the interactivity of the overlay. This means you can switch OV to become inactive, allowing you to interact with the underlying applications or games without interference from the overlay.

Flexibility
OV’s primary feature is its flexibility. You can move and resize the overlay to fit your needs, making it a versatile tool for any situation.

Important Notice
While OV strives to provide seamless multitasking capabilities, it may not be compatible with all games due to the aggressive method used to overlay the window on top. This technical limitation means that some games might not work perfectly with OV. Some games may need to be set to windowed mode, then resized to full screen, for full functionality.
